>On 2002-07-02 at 03:53 Amardeep Singh Bhatia wrote:
>
> >Hi all,
> >        I am new to junit, so can anyone tell me how to 
>generate
> >testresults using junit's TestResult class.
>

>and
>errors and so on. Is there something more specific you need to 
>know
>about it?
